name: Energia
description: This short but sweet game presents a polished combination of tower defense and base building. Manage your energy network to both defend from and attack foes all while enjoying a clean, zero budget art style.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.80GHz Memory: 200 MB RAM Graphics: Intel(R) HD Graphics 5500 Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio Additional Notes: It can run on lower but these are what I officially support
